locations.title: TA Express Travel Center
locations.content: TA Express Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: A truck stops that is very RV friendly.  Candice the Assistant Manager made us feel right at home. Very safe and clean place to stop, spend the night and get a nice hot shower. This will be one of my go to stops when traveling south from De

‚Ä¶ filled up the truck at the T/A gas station with 80 gallons, I understand that it is not much but it was enough for a shower, but unfortunately I could not take a shower because I do not have an account, I do not fill up at T/A so often to ‚Ä¶

Davis Travel Center is looking like new, the place is a nice travel center to stop by. I have taken a shower here with was hot, nice and clean.. Lots of parking for the trucks. They have Subway inside and Starbucks.

Avoid this place at all cost!! I was kicked out of this place after stopping for a quick shower, just because they are now TA and our ultra one card doesn‚Äôt work anymore!! No gesture of kindness for the manager in charge( Kediri) whatsoever ‚Ä¶

We used Davis Travel Center when we were going to NJ. We stayed overnight and used their clean shower room, the employees were friendly and very nice to the customers, i told my husband we will use them again so in coming back, we Used this ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ it was because of my experience the last time I was there. My husband is a truck driver and we constantly have stopped here to shower, eat, and sleep etc. Every single time I‚Äôve been here my experience with the employees have been ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ where to start. The people behind the counter we're beyond genuine. Wait time was quite a bit for a shower, but you gotta come at the right time so you don't wait. Besides that, showers were clean and worth the wait. They have a Denny's, ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ world, and get a WOW experience. 3 words, Davis Travel Center. Everywhere I travel as a truck driver, I deal with no parking, or paid parking, paid showers and so on. I stopped in Davis Travel Center expecting no parking spots at 7pm and ‚Ä¶

I want to give them more ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê than that best for truckers Free shower clean restroom low price on everything inside i thought they going to charge me for shower otherwise they get my balls clean üòÇ thank you guys. ‚Ä¶
Shower was cold.  Mold/mildew growing in grout.  No wash cloth or soap.  This place is going downhill fast.  I wont go there anymore unless it's a last resort resort.

locations.title: Love's Travel Stop
locations.content: Love's Travel Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Stopped for the night to get my 10 hours of rest and my company doesn‚Äôt use Loves for fuel so I had to pay for a shower.  Although the showers were very clean it is quite disheartening to have to pay $17.00 for a shower and then be forced ‚Ä¶

Came here to grab a shower. I was told there's a wait. Then told they're cleaning "showers" fast as they can. 6 hours later I discovered that they have only had 1 shower running all day. I have now been almost 7 hours waiting when they ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ The morning crew is OUTSTANDING! All 3 members that I interacted  with were polite,  courteous actually looked happy to be there. Our shower was spotless, the coffee was hot but we really appreciate the amazing customer service. ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ However, it's a clean place to park, have a shower, and clean restrooms. Only 2 üåü ‚Ä¶

I drive trucks and I came in here at 9:40 am to get a shower and there were 6 loves workers just standing around not doing anything. Me and another driver waited 45 minutes which was the time were supposed to have been waiting and still no ‚Ä¶

So im a proffesional driver and i tried to verify a shower token and they told me the first card didnt have one and that the fuel used had to be 50gal all at once so i went back to the truck and brought back a second card with one on it and ‚Ä¶
Hair in the shower! Three different prices for one üëï! What's going on here! Losing the love or what? The person on that PA system is just overly aggressive, more like a warden. ‚Ä¶
They refused to give me shower as they wanted to see real points card. I had to use my app to book shower. I‚Äôll be moving to flying j for fueling
Shower was clean and water was hot and people were very nice and polite
They give you coupons for things you never buy. Whassup widdat? Someday I'll buy a shower

locations.title: Star Express Travel Center
locations.content: Star Express Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: I would recommend any trucker to stop here get fuel shower and something to eat. Clean shower and friendly staff.

‚Ä¶ well do it all in one stop. No counter space in the showers, no place to sit, other than the toilet and a bench that's in the shower, my wallet fell into the sink and the water came on automatically, now everything is all wet, so watch out.

Clean shower
Good food
Good amount of parking too
Nice place to stop fuel price is not expensive,shower is clean and friendly staffs

locations.title: Pilot Travel Center
locations.content: Pilot Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ 6pm to 8pm. Hopefully at 7pm in this Pilot you won't find any parking or maybe 1 or 2 spots. As most Pilots it come with a good a good pack of showers and an area to go clean your close. Best time to get a quick shower is around 7pm to 8pm.

I only use pilots for parking and the occasional free shower (but I do not purchase fuel from PFJ, ever) That said, the parking lot at this Colonial Heights location is spacious and easy to get into without incident, even for a Swift driver ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ Then I got a shower, no wait again.. shower was average asked for extra towels, it was no problem. ‚Ä¶

Come get some good pilot house coffee. You can eat wendys here take a shower they have 9 shower rooms staff is very friendly and at pilot we take care of all trnck drivers all driving needs. Theres even Roadside assistance and there mobile.

Disappointed to say the least. Finally finish the day to get a hot shower & hit the hay before going at it the following days. Only the "HOT" was missing, the towels were also missing, & it looked as if the last individual left the shower & ‚Ä¶

Don't come again here if you come you 100% waste time,  I am waiting before 2 hours for shower and still waiting Employees are rude and lazy no one clear shower.  I don't know why they people lazy maybe they worked for free
Very friendly and nice stuff, clean shower and  restroom. Wendy's restaurant available

‚Ä¶ spots to be had @ 4:00 pm. Manager was checking trucks in reserved spots but wasn't very enthused whrn we asked him to make someone move.  Got a shower fairly quickly.  Not much water pressure.  In AM, dude behind the counter did not want ‚Ä¶
Best shower I've had in a while. Employees are really good and helpful
This was my first time getting a shower here. It was worth every dollar. Hot, lots of force from the shower head, clean and secure. I felt very safe. It was glorious! Thank you
